page.title: 10Food
page.content: My favourite meals are chips and Chinese food.On Sundays we have meat and Yorkshire Pudding, which is a crisp batter pudding that you eat with meat. A typical week' menu of school meals: Day 1:stew,potatoes,carrots,jam tarts. Day 2:cheeseflan,chips,tomatoes,apple. Day 3:meat pie,cabbage,mashed potato, ice buns. Day 4:meat,roast potatoes, peas,iced bun. Day 5:fish,chips,beans, milk shake. 56 children were questioned:For breakfast 2 had fruit,39 cereal and 10 had toast.The most popular school dinners were:fish and chips(21),curry (12),sausages(7).The most popular vegetables were:baked beans(31),tinned tomatoes(8),mushy peas(5).The most popular sweets were:milkshake(20), doughnut(8),yoghurt(7).
